title: Net additions to the housing stock

versions.title: Net additions to the housing stock
versions.summary: Net additions to the dwelling stock (including new builds, conversions, changes of use, other gains/losses and offset by demolitions) per 1,000 stock, England, financial year 2022 - 2023.
versions.description:
This dataset shows the net additions to the dwelling stock (including new builds, conversions, changes of use, other gains/losses and offset by demolitions) per 1,000 stock, in England, for financial year 2022 - 2023.

### Coverage 

England

#### Geography definition

Local Authority Districts and Unitary Authorities,
Counties,
Metropolitan Counties,
Nation (England) 

### Source

 - England: [Department for Levelling Up, Housing and Communities]
